name: Rebirth Trimension
description:
Rebirth Trimension is a 2D Puzzle-Platformer game.

In this game you will need to place Checkpoints on the levels and die to change dimensions !

There are 7 levels + 1 hidden level and 2 easter eggs. Good Luck ! :)

Done for the #wowiejam3.0 ! This is my 2nd GameJam, it was a fun experience !

Controls :

  • A and D or arrows : Moving Left/Right
  • Space : Jump
  • LCTRL : Placing a Checkpoint

Ressources used :

WOWIE Asset Pack : https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

The ThaleahFat Font : https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah
